推定年齢: (すいていねんれい) - estimated (probable) age (e.g. of victim)
推定無罪: (すいていむざい) - presumption of innocence
推定相続人: (すいていそうぞくにん) - heir(s) presumptive
推挙式: (すいきょしき) - first ring-entering ceremony of the newly promoted grand champion, performed at Meiji shrine
推測る: (おしはかる) - to guess; to conjecture; to surmise
推測統計学: (すいそくとうけいがく) - inferential statistics
推理: (すいり) - reasoning; inference; mystery or detective genre (movie, novel, etc.)
推理作家: (すいりさっか) - mystery writer; detective fiction writer; crime author
推理力: (すいりりょく) - deductive powers; reasoning capability; reasoning skill
推理小説: (すいりしょうせつ) - mystery novel; detective novel; whodunit
推移図: (すいいず) - transition diagram; trend diagram
推薦図書: (すいせんとしょ) - recommended books; recommended reading
推薦枠: (すいせんわく) - quota for recommendations (e.g. student admissions, new team members, etc.); recommendation limit
推薦状: (すいせんじょう) - letter of invitation; letter of recommendation; reference
推論: (すいろん) - inference; deduction; induction; reasoning
推論エンジン: (すいろんエンジン) - inference engine
推進: (suishin) - propulsion, drive; promotion (ex. de uma política governamental), furtherance, implementation
推進力: (すいしんりょく) - propulsive power; driving force
推進母体: (すいしんぼたい) - (yoji) nucleus (of a project proposal, of a social movement, etc.)
推進者: (すいしんしゃ) - promoter; instigator; driving force; pioneer; leader
推進部: (すいしんぶ) - (usu. as XXX推進部) promotion department; development department; enhancement department
推量る: (おしはかる) - to guess; to conjecture; to surmise
掩う: (おおう) - to cover; to hide; to conceal; to wrap; to disguise
掩撃: (えんげき) - sneak attack (by a small group); surprise attack
掩護射撃: (えんごしゃげき) - (yoji) (providing) covering fire; supporting (backing up) someone (in a debate or argument)
措いて: (おいて) - (usu. as 措いて)  except; no other
措く: (oku) - parar (de fazer algo), cessar, deixar de lado; deixar como está, deixar em paz; excluir, exceto
措置を講じる: (そちをこうじる) - to take measures; to take steps; to take action; to make a move
措置入院: (そちにゅういん) - (yoji) involuntary admission (commitment) (to a mental hospital)
掬い上げる: (すくいあげる) - to dip or scoop up
掬い出す: (すくいだす) - to bail (water out of a boat)
掬い取る: (すくいとる) - to dip out; to scoop up; to ladle out
掬い投げ: (すくいなげ) - {sumo} variety of beltless arm throw
掬い網: (すくいあみ) - scoop net; insect net
掬う: (すくう) - to scoop; to ladle out
掬する: (きくする) - to scoop up (with both hands); to empathize with/to take into consideration
掲げる: (かかげる) - to publish/to print/to carry (an article); to put up/to hang out/to hoist/to fly (a sail)/to float (a flag, kite, etc.); to tuck up (e.g. sleeves)/to roll up; to tout (a principle, plan, etc.)/to adopt (a slogan); to stoke a fire/to fan a flame
掲出: (keishutsu) - posting (por exemplo, um aviso), displaying, putting up
掲示: (けいじ) - notice; bulletin; post; posting; placard
掲示を出す: (けいじをだす) - to post a notice; to put up a notice
掲示板: (keijiban) - quadro de avisos, quadro de informações; quadro de avisos eletrônico, BBS
掲示板システム: (けいじばんシステム) - bulletin board system; BBS
掲載: (keisai) - publication (ex. de um artigo em um jornal), carrying (e.g. a story), running (e.g. a serial), insertion (e.g. of an advertisement), printing, posting (e.g. on the web)
掲題の件: (けいだいのけん) - (formal) topic at hand; current topic
掴まえる: (つかまえる) - to catch; to arrest; to seize
掴まる: (つかまる) - (usu. 捕まる) to be caught/to be arrested; (usu. 掴まる) to hold on to/to grasp; to find (e.g. proof)/to get (e.g. a taxi); to be detained by
掴み出す: (つかみだす) - to take out/to take a handful of/to grab and throw; to turn someone out (of house, room, etc.)
掴み取り: (つかみどり) - grabbing; taking (as much as one can hold) by the hand
掴み取る: (つかみとる) - to grasp; to get
掴み所: (つかみどころ) - point (of a conversation, etc.)/sense; hold/grip
掴み所がない: (つかみどころがない) - vague; fuzzy; elusive; slippery
掴み所のない: (つかみどころのない) - vague; fuzzy; elusive; slippery
掴み掛かる: (つかみかかる) - to grab at
